name: Ishungu (Lake Spirit)
shortLoreBlurb: Ishungu (Lake Spirit) is a spirit from Tanzania associated with lake tanganyika, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
overlapsLinks: Indra (Vedic), Manann√°n (Celtic), Naga (India/SE Asia), Perun (Slavic), Poseidon (Greek), Tangaroa (Polynesia), Thor (Norse), Yemaya (Yoruba), Zeus (Greek)
description: Ishungu (Lake Spirit) is a spirit from Tanzania associated with lake tanganyika, storms. Linked to tempests and the rule of kings. Appeased for safe passage and rains.
